# NSUserActivity.TypedPayloadError

**Enumeration**

An enumeration that describes the error types for getting and setting a typed payload.

## Declaration

```swift
enum TypedPayloadError
```

## Overview

Use this enumeration to manage errors from [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSUserActivity/typedPayload(_:)] and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSUserActivity/setTypedPayload(_:)].

## Typed payload errors

- **NSUserActivity.TypedPayloadError.encodingError**: An encoding error that indicates that the content failed to encode into a valid dictionary.
- **NSUserActivity.TypedPayloadError.invalidContent**: A decoding error that indicates that the user info dictionary is empty or invalid.

## Managing type-safe access to user info

- **setTypedPayload(_:)**: Encodes the specified payload into the user activity’s user info dictionary.
- **typedPayload(_:)**: Decodes the user activity’s user info dictionary as an instance of the specified type.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- Equatable
- Error
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
